body.name: Jade 4-in-1 Convertible Crib - Greenguard Gold Certified, Ebony/Bronze
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 48 mins
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB : Crib converts to a toddler bed, daybed and sofa (Daybed/Sofa Rail included, Toddler Guardrail #0094 sold separately) | Available in Bianca White w/Melted Bronze, and Ebony w/Melted Bronze

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This Convertible Crib meets the most stringent chemical emissions standards to create a healthier home for your child. Tested for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs, this crib is certified to contribute to cleaner indoor air

SAFE OPTION FOR YOUR BABY: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM | We know chemicals have no place in your nursery, so we use a non-toxic multi-step painting process that is lead and phthalate safe

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Adjustable height mattress support with 3 convenient positions to grow with your baby | ACCESS RAIL DIMENSIONS:From Floor: 33.75"; From Top Mattress Support Position: 16.50"; From Bottom Mattress Support Position: 26.50"

COORDINATING ITEMS: Pair this crib with the Jade Changing Table or any Delta Children dresser in the same color | Uses a standard size crib mattress (sold separately) | To ensure the perfect fit pair your crib with a Serta, Beautyrest or Simmons Kids crib mattress
body.description: The Jade 4-in-1 Convertible Crib by Delta Children is the new gold standard for modern nurseries with its gorgeous bronze metal base. Stylish and safe, it’s GREENGUARD Gold Certified, which means it’s built to contribute to cleaner air for a healthy home. A standout piece for years to come, this crib features an adjustable mattress support that allows you to lower the mattress height as your baby grows. When your child is ready, its versatile design easily adapts from crib to a cozy toddler bed, daybed and sofa (Daybed/Sofa Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #0094 sold separately). The Jade 4-in-1 Convertible Crib by Delta Children is available in Bianca White and Ebony. Coordinates with the Jade Changing Table (sold separately).Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. That's why all Delta Children cribs are JPMA certified and are tested above and beyond industry standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Delta Children Jade 4-in-1 Convertible Crib Delta Children Essex 3 Drawer Dresser Delta Children Essex Desk & Chair Set, Greenguard Gold Certified, Grey/Natural Delta Children Logan Wood Toddler Bed Delta Children MySize 9 Bin Plastic Toy Organizer Delta Children Twinkle Galaxy Dual Sided Recycled Fiber Core Mattress The Jade 4-in-1 Convertible Crib by Delta Children is the new gold standard for modern nurseries with its gorgeous bronze metal base. The Essex 3 Drawer Dresser by Delta Children is a must-have storage unit for stylish parents and kids! Designed to elevate modern nurseries or bedrooms Give your child a stylish spot to draw, read or do homework with the Essex Desk & Chair Set by Delta Children The Logan Wood Toddler Bed by Delta Children is a must-have bed for stylish parents and kids! Designed to elevate big-kid bedrooms When playtime is done, the cleanup begins, and the MySize 9 Bin Plastic Toy Organizer from Delta Children makes it easier than ever to tidy up. The Twinkle Galaxy Crib and Toddler Mattress by Delts Children has everything your baby needs for a healthy, refreshing sleep, each and every night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to put together!
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this is a well-designed crib! It was easy to put together in about 45 minutes (by myself.. although my cat "helped"). The only area where I needed human hands was that I had my husband bring up the box and had his help installing the mattress support. You definitely want to have help on that so that things don't get bent or broken.. although this seems sturdy and well-made enough that I don't think that would necessarily happen.One more thing to note- I loooove that there are no screw holes visible on the outside. I've seen other cribs that they didn't provide caps for the screws. However, they could have provided caps for when you adjust the mattress later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This changing table is amazing. I love that it has a modern look so it does not stick out in a place like a living room. The simplistic design will fit into any living place. Putting it together was so easy. I was able to do it with both kids at my feet. The instructions were easy to follow. The changing pad on top is also delta children & fits perfectly. Highly recommend. It is awesome quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetically pleasing and functional
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect changing table. It’s made from sustainable materials, non-toxic, and safe and it’s aesthetically pleasing in any room. Storage space is perfect for diapers, wipes and much more. It was also easy to put together which is always an added bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous! I love this changing table!
reviews.reviewText: This changing table is fantastic! It’s beautiful, sturdy, the wheels make it super easy to move the table room to room which is super convenient. Love this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This crib was just what I was looking for! Super cute! Easy to build but instructions did get a little confusing, other than that I love this crib! Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Safe Convertible Crib!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this Convertible Crib! Its stylish design complements any nursery decor, and the Greenguard Gold certification ensures a safe environment for my little one.The convertible feature is fantastic, allowing the crib to grow with my child from infancy to toddlerhood and beyond. The sturdy construction gives me peace of mind knowing it will last for years to come.Assembly was straightforward, and the crib's quality is outstanding. I couldn't be happier with this purchase, and I highly recommend it to all parents. A top-notch choice for your precious one! 👶🏼👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how cute this changing station is! It has two lower levels to store everything you need for a changing station. It fit perfect in our room next to our bed so we don’t have to go far to change our baby. It’s also the right height where you aren’t bending down and hurting your back. I’m considering purchasing another one for our living room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and tall
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize it was quite tall, even though there were measurements available in the description. The wheels require more effort to lock, which is inconvenient, but other than that, it can fit a lot! I use it as a fancy changing table in the 2nd floor, since my other changing table is in the 3rd floor. I may buy the other one in black for the 1st floor just so I don't have to keep going up and down the stairs to change my baby.
